/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of looking up towards the sky. The sky is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. People can be seen strolling along the sidewalk, going about their day. Cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, indicating a well-organized traffic system. The image is bathed in the warm glow of a sunny day, casting long shadows and highlighting the vibrant colors of the scene.
